name: 陳曉瑩
objective:
本課程進一步加深商業會議所需之英語能力，諸如會議重點摘要、發表簡報及主持司儀；簡介常見隨行外賓的英語使用情境，提供主題式相關訓練。
This course prepares students for conferences with focused English skills such as summarizing speeches, delivering presentations, acting as a MC or moderator. Introduction to and training by topic for other workplace scenarios.
